SEARCH
Package org.team21.game.utils.adapter

Class Adapter

java.lang.Object
org.team21.game.models.map.DominationMap
org.team21.game.utils.adapter.Adapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Adapter extends DominationMap implements Serializable
This class serves as an adapter to implement the Adapter Pattern for converting map files between different map formats, specifically between Domination and Conquest map formats. It extends the DominationMap class and utilizes an instance of the Adaptee class for map file operations. The Adapter class facilitates the interoperability between different map formats by providing methods to read and save map files in the Domination format, using the functionality of the Adaptee class which is designed to handle Conquest map files.

    • saveMap

      public boolean saveMap(GameMap p_map, String p_fileName)
      Saves the input map to a file with the given name, overwriting any existing map with the same name. The map will only be saved if it is valid.
      Overrides:
      saveMap in class DominationMap
      Parameters:
      p_map - The map to save
      p_fileName - The name of the file to save to, including the extension
      Returns:
      True if the file was successfully saved, otherwise false
